Similarity Criterion.description: Learn how to prove triangles are similar using AA, SAS, and SSS criteria. Master proportional sides and corresponding angles to solve complex geometric problems.

Converse of Basic Proportionality Theore.description: Explore the relationship between parallel lines and proportional segments in triangles. Apply the theorem and its converse to find unknown lengths and prove geometric properties.

Trigonometric Identities.description: Master fundamental trigonometric identities including Pythagorean, reciprocal, and quotient identities. Learn to prove complex equations by transforming expressions step by step.

Trigonometry Applications - Heights & Di.description: Apply trigonometry to real-world scenarios involving heights, distances, angles of elevation and depression. Solve problems related to buildings, mountains, rivers, and navigation.
